name: DeeperWeDelve
description:
The lair of the Shadowking is a fearsome Dungeon that can not be delved in one trip. Use the gold you accumulate to hire more adventurers to keep your party alive. While a single adventurer may die, the party lives on as long as one member survives.

WASD to move the camera.
MouseWheel to zoom
Left click to select party members.
Left click drag to box select multiple party members.
Right Click to Move, attack and Interact.
Challenges are taken on by the first party member to engage them. So pay attention to positioning.
